revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Edinburgh new dispensatory: containing I. The Elements of Pharmaceutical Chemistry: containing I. The Elements of Pharmaceutical Chemistry. II. The Materia Medic..."
revision.text: Possibly: The Edinburgh new dispensatory: containing I. The Elements of Pharmaceutical Chemistry: containing I. The Elements of Pharmaceutical Chemistry. II. The Materia Medica; or, An Account of the Natural History, Qualities, Operations, and Uses, of the different Substances employed in Medicine. III. The Pharmaceutical Preparations and Medicinal compositions of the New Editions of the London (1788) and Edinburgh (1783) Pharmacopoeias; with Explanatory, Critical and Practical Boservations on each..., by William Lewis. (Edinburgh : Printed for Charles Elliot; and for C. Elliot and T. Kay, at Dr Cullen's Head, Opposite Somerset-Place, Strand, London, M,DCC,LXXXIX. [1789]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2507446~S1
